p: Territory of Washington County of Thruston }ss

C W Hartinan of said County being first duly sworn on oath deposes and says I am one of the attorneys for petitioner in the foregoing petition named I have read the said petition know and understand the contents thereof and I believe that it is true affiant further says that he makes this verification on behalf of said petitioner and says for the that the petitioner is a Cinese and does not sufficiently understand the English language to enable him to readily comprehend the .rareology of said petition
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 23d day of April 1885
